From the brand

V+bestlife

We are constantly discovering and meeting the needs of this changing world, we believe in V (victory), we can pursue the best life!

We think instant messaging will be more and more important in our lives and it is! Similarly, we believe that there will be more and more different changes in the demand for instant messaging. In order to allow more people who do not have instant messaging to join the information life, in this field, we are committed to discovering some distinctive and more Easy circulation of cell phones and telephone!

Information spreads faster in this world; we are committed to better understanding needs and producing products that better meet them!

How did we get our start?

We found that some needs were not being met, and then we wanted to address the situation.

What makes our products unique?

Whether it is in different countries, different regions, or different concepts and consumption habits, the development of the world makes consumer demand change extremely fast and huge. We are constantly discovering this change, catching up with this change, meeting this change, and making our products more in line with consumer needs. This is our starting point, and this is why we think our products are different.

IP12 PRO Android Smartphone

IP12 PRO Unlocked Android Smartphone ,6.26in Waterdrop Full Screen Dual SIM Cell Phone ,Ultra Thin Mobile Phone

3G Android Smartphone For Sale

Vintage wired landline phone

Unlocked Android Smartphone

Unlocked Android Smartphone

HD Resolution：720*1560 high definition resolution , front and rear cameras , vivid colors , every photo is as beautiful as wallpaper. Shoot beautiful portraits , stunning landscapes and clear close up shots in any light
High Performance：Quad core CPU , powerful processor , greatly improves the network , running speed , frame rate and picture smoothness when playing large games and multitasking.Face recognition can always be accurately identified , bringing you a science fiction experience
Large Storage Space：1+8GB memory storage and up to 128GB expandable storage , support two SIM cards for data and phone calls at the same time , or use Micro SD card for data storage at the same time. The dual card dual standby function meets your needs for multiple SIMs
Android 8.1 System：Based on the in-depth development of the Android system, it is more complete and smooth. Android 8.1 is compatible with most applications on the market. In addition to the smartphone of this product, you will also get a protective cover*1, protective film*1, earphone*1, data cable*1, manual*1


Vbestlife Goals

At Vbestlife, our goal is to provide innovative, high-quality products that everyone can afford. Quality is the key! If for any reason, you don’t like Vbestlife’s smartphones, please tell us and we will help you solve it.

  • Creativity
  • High quality
  • High performance
  • Quality after-sales service

Vbestlife Android Smartphone

Excellent Smartphone

The mobile phone is equipped with a 6.26-inch high-definition full-fit water drop screen, 720*1560 high-definition resolution, a powerful quad-core CPU, 1+8GB memory storage, dual-card dual-standby, deep development based on the Android system, comfortable use experience, smooth operation.

  • 6.26-inch Full Screen
  • HD Resolution
  • Large Storage Space
  • Android 8.1 System

Read more

High Definition Camera

The smart phone is equipped with a high-definition camera, with bright colors, and each photo is as beautiful as a wallpaper. It is deeply developed and more complete and smooth. Front camera: 2MP, f/2.0 aperture, fixed focal length, rear camera: 2MP (color, f/1.8 aperture) autofocus.

Dual Card Dual Standby

This smart phone supports the simultaneous use of two SIM cards for data and phone calls, or the simultaneous use of memory cards for data storage. Scalable storage up to 128GB (128G memory card not included).

Battery Capacity

The 6.26-inch high-definition full-fit water drop screen is equipped with a 1950mah lithium-ion battery. The powerful processor greatly improves the running speed, frame rate and smoothness of the picture when playing large-scale games and multitasking.

Read more

Face Recognition

Accurate identification, bring you a science fiction experience！

Read more

Vbestlife IP12 PRO+

6.26 inch Large Screen Smartphone

The high-definition large-screen smart phone allows you to experience a broader field of view and display more content, allowing you to enjoy and enjoy it more when playing games or watching videos.

The weight of the smartphone is only 365g. When you hold it in your hand, the phone is still small and light, which is convenient for you to use. This is a high-performance smartphone with both practicality and professionalism.

Package List:

  • 1 x Phone
  • 1 x Protect Cover
  • 1 x Film
  • 1 x Earphone
  • 1 x Data Cable
  • 1 x Manual

Special Christmas Gift

On the occasion of Christmas, this smartphone is also the best gift for your family and friends!

[HD Full Screen] Smartphone adopts a 5.45 inch full screen with a screen to body ratio of up to 91 percent, allowing you to experience a wider field of view. Like a drop of water on the screen, more content is displayed, and the phone is still small and light.
[Quick Response] Mobile phone adopts for MTK6799 quad core CPU processor and for Android 6 system, which greatly reduces the probability of stuck and crashing. Play games, grab red packets and multitask with improved network, running speed, frame rate and more.
[Large Memory] The phone has 2GB RAM and 32GB ROM, which ensures fast loading of the screen, and frequently used processes reside in the background to quickly switch other applications. Long time is not afraid of crashing.
[Easy To Use] Support up to 128GB of expandable storage, the phone can use two SIM cards and one Memory Card at the same time for phone calls and data storage. With face recognition, it can accurately recognize faces at all times and unlock quickly.
